SELECT QUIZ_NO FROM MEMBER_QUIZ_ANSWER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_ID}
SELECT QUIZ_LEVEL FROM QUIZ WHERE QUIZ_NO = #{quiz_No}
mapper.update: UPDATE RANKING SET DAILY_JUMSU = #{daily_Jumsu} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS R, RK.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM RANKING ORDER BY DAILY_JUMSU DESC) RK WHERE ROWNUM <= 5)
SELECT MEMBER_NICK FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE RANKING SET MEMBER_NICK = #{member_Nick} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_ID}
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NICK , BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENTS , BOARD_DATE , BOARD_HIT , FLAG , QUIZ_NO FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS R , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NICK , BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENTS , BOARD_DATE , BOARD_HIT , FLAG , QUIZ_NO FROM ( SELECT m.MEMBER_ID , m.MEMBER_NICK , qa.BOARD_NUM , qa.BOARD_TITLE , qa.BOARD_CONTENTS , qa.BOARD_DATE , qa.BOARD_HIT , qa.FLAG , bql.QUIZ_NO FROM QNA qa INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON m.MEMBER_ID = qa.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN BOARD_QUIZ_LINK bql ON bql.BOARD_NUM = qa.BOARD_NUM WHERE flag =0 ORDER BY BOARD_DATE DESC ) ) temp WHERE R <= 5
